content.html: My 4 yr old: are crabs happy? Do crabs have friends? My wife: does this mean there aren’t actually any different species on earth and instead we’re just all at different points on our way to Crab?
content.value:
My 4 yr old: are crabs happy? Do crabs have friends?

My wife: does this mean there aren’t actually any different species on earth and instead we’re just all at different points on our way to Crab?
